recipesJson.name: Mānuka
recipesJson.author: Silky
recipesJson.description:
This is a delicious Pear/Kiwi forward fruit mix with a touch of honey! I hope you like it.

https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/8bwndl/m%C4%81nuka_a_kiwi_recipe

reviews.text: This is LEGIT! Ive been thinking about adding some pink guava to this

Had to sub INW Pear with FA Pear (1:1) and I'm enjoying it quite a lot.  I mainly get pear with a slight hint of honey on the exhale.  If I put my mind to it I can detect the kiwi behind the pear, but for the most part it just blends together into one juicy honey pear.  Very nice.  If I don't forget about it, I will put INW Pear in my next order and give this a real rating.  Update:  Finally got the chance to try it with INW Pear.  Even better!  Although FA Pear is a good enough sub.  Thanks!
